title: The Blackwitch Legacy
description: Set against the vast lands and incomparable beauty of the Canadian Rockies, dominated by a towering black ridge, The Blackwitch Legacy brews a tale of conflict and triumph for both man and beast, where treasures are wrested from the cold breast of the Blackwitch and lost for a half century, only to reemerge and change lives forever. .Here beauty and savagery, honor and deceit, kindness and greed weave their magic, mirroring the lives of men and women in an untamed environment.
author: S. Bradley Stoner
